meanings.definition: A small, handheld tool used in laboratories for transferring small amounts of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist carefully used the micropipet to move a tiny drop of liquid.
meanings.sent2: The micropipet is essential for accurately measuring small amounts of liquid in the lab.
meanings.sent3: When the micropipet started singing, everyone in the lab was surprised!
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the micropipet was like a skilled artist painting with watercolors.
meanings.sent5: The micropipet, a tiny magic wand, made the liquid dance in the test tube.

meanings.definition: To use a micropipet to accurately measure and transfer small volumes of liquid.
meanings.sent1: She will micropipet the solution into the test tube with great care.
meanings.sent2: Remember to always micropipet slowly to avoid any spills.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to micropipet the ingredients for the recipe, just for fun!
meanings.sent4: He micropipeted his emotions into his art, creating a masterpiece of colors.
meanings.sent5: Micropipeting the liquid felt like conducting a delicate symphony of molecules.
